alerts.alert_text:
Buses will replace trains between Mordialloc and Frankston/Stony Point until last service, Sunday 28 July due to Level Crossing Removal project works.
This may increase your journey time by up to 60 minutes. Replacement buses are subject to local traffic conditions.
Visit our Planned Works webpage to see how your journey may be affected.
Visit the Level Crossings Removal Project webpage for details of the Station Street, Carrum project.

Buses will replace trains between Thornbury and Mernda until last service, Sunday 28 July due to Level Crossings Removal Project works.
This may increase your journey time by up to 45 minutes.
Visit our Planned Works webpage to see how your journey may be affected.
